pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, September 29, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Japan, Suga Yoshihide.

Closed to media.

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a follow-up meeting of the United Nations High-Level Event on Financing for Development in the Era of COVID-19 and Beyond.                                                                                                                                  

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as http://twitter.com/UNWebTV.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a joint press conference with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, António Guterres, and the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

The event will be streamed online at http://webtv.un.org, as well as http://twitter.com/UNWebTV.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
